Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Dagger = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local connection
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
local lastAttack = 0
local r = game:service("RunService")
local damage = 24
local daggerSound
local throwDagger
local lunging = false
while Tool:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") == nil do wait() end
local fireWeld = Tool.FireWeld
function throw(key) key = key:lower() if key == "q" then throwDagger = Tool:FindFirstChild("ThrowDagger") if throwDagger and throwDagger.Value == false then throwDagger.Value = true end end end
function lunge(humanoid, torso) lunging = true local holdAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.HoldAnim) if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() else Tool.Enabled = true return end local target = humanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) newBV = nil daggerOut() if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = torso torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, torso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(.75) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end wait(.5) lunging = false daggerUp() end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil or vCharacter == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then local rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then local rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Dagger or rightGrip.Part1 == Dagger) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) local torso = humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if lunging and torso and humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("ForceScript") == nil then local cloneScript = Tool.ForceScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent
local direction = (torso.Position - Dagger.Position).unit if cloneScript:FindFirstChild("Direction") then cloneScript.Direction.Value = direction end
cloneScript.Disabled = false end end end end end
function daggerUp() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function daggerOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) end
function attack() local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Slash" anim.Parent = Tool end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
throwDagger = Tool:FindFirstChild("ThrowDagger") if throwDagger and throwDagger.Value == true then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local t = r.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastAttack < 0.2) then daggerSound = Dagger:FindFirstChild("DaggerSound") if daggerSound then daggerSound:Play() end lunge(myHumanoid, myTorso) else attack() end lastAttack = t
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 20.0 end
if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(throw) end
if fireWeld then fireWeld.Parent = Tool end end
function onUnequipped() -- do nothing if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end if holdAnim then holdAnim:Stop() end if daggerSound then daggerSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
connection = Dagger.Touched:connect(blow)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Dagger = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local cloneDagger
local damage = 15
local maxDistance = 45.0
local awayFromCharacter = false
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
while Tool:FindFirstChild("ThrowDagger") == nil do wait() end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creator, 1) end end
function sleep(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and myHumanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) local character = humanoid.Parent if character and character:FindFirstChild("SleepScript") == nil then local cloneScript = Tool.SleepScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = character
local sleepy = cloneScript:FindFirstChild("Sleepy") if sleepy then sleepy.Value = 4 end
cloneScript.Disabled = false else local sleepy = character.SleepScript:FindFirstChild("Sleepy") if sleepy then sleepy.Value = sleepy.Value + 2 end end awayFromCharacter = false end end end
function returnToCharacter(cloneDagger) if cloneDagger and myTorso then local distance = (cloneDagger.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude local lookAt = (myTorso.Position - cloneDagger.Position).unit while distance > 4.0 and cloneDagger do cloneDagger.Velocity = lookAt * 45.0 if cloneDagger then lookAt = (myTorso.Position - cloneDagger.Position).unit distance = (myTorso.Position - cloneDagger.Position).magnitude end wait() end if cloneDagger then cloneDagger:Remove() cloneDagger = nil end wait(0.25) end end
function throw(cloneDagger, direction)
local spawnPos = Dagger.Position + direction * 4.0 cloneDagger.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) cloneDagger.CanCollide = false
cloneDagger.Velocity = direction * 45.0 cloneDagger.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 40, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, cloneDagger:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = cloneDagger
cloneDagger.Parent = game.Workspace
cloneDagger.Touched:connect(function(hit) sleep(hit) end)
awayFromCharacter = true
local distance = (cloneDagger.Position - spawnPos).magnitude while awayFromCharacter and distance < maxDistance do distance = (cloneDagger.Position - spawnPos).magnitude wait(0.25) end awayFromCharacter = false returnToCharacter(cloneDagger) end
local throwDagger = Tool.ThrowDagger throwDagger.Changed:connect(function() if throwDagger and throwDagger.Value == true and myTorso and myHumanoid then Tool.Enabled = false local sign = 1 Dagger.Transparency = 1.0
local firePart = Dagger:FindFirstChild("FirePart") local fire if firePart then fire = firePart:FindFirstChild("Fire") end if fire then fire.Enabled = false end
for i = 1, 5 do sign = sign * -1 local cloneDagger = Dagger:Clone() cloneDagger.Transparency = 0.0 local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = CFrame.Angles(0, (i-1) * sign * math.pi/18, 0) * (target - Dagger.Position).unit
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() throw(cloneDagger, direction) end)) end wait(4.5) Dagger.Transparency = 0.0 if fire then fire.Enabled = true end wait(4.0) Tool.Enabled = true throwDagger.Value = false end end)
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

local vCharacter = script.Parent
local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local backpack = nil
if vPlayer then backpack = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("Backpack") end
local sleeping = false
local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then script:Remove() end
while script:FindFirstChild("Sleepy") == nil do wait() end
local toolInHand = nil local backpackItems = {} local zStorage = {}
local sleepVal = script.Sleepy sleepVal.Changed:connect(function() if sleepVal and sleepVal.Value > 5 and not sleeping then
local duration = 2.0 if script:FindFirstChild("Duration") and script.Duration.Value > 0 then duration = script.Duration.Value end
backpackItems = {} toolInHand = nil sleeping = true sleepVal.Value = 0
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 myTorso.Anchored = true
local children = vCharacter:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i] and children[i].className == "Tool" then toolInHand = children[i] toolInHand.Parent = nil end end
if backpack then local bChildren = backpack:GetChildren() for j = 1, #bChildren do if bChildren[j] then table.insert(backpackItems, bChildren[j]) bChildren[j].Parent = nil end end end
while duration > 0 do
local z = Instance.new("Part") z.Name = "Z" z.CFrame = (vCharacter.Head.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) z.CanCollide = false
local zMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") zMesh.Parent = z zMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65046096" zMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65020347" zMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.05, 0.05, 0.05)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, z:GetMass() * 208, 0) floatForce.Parent = z
z.Parent = game.Workspace
table.insert(zStorage, z)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() while z and zMesh and #zStorage > 0 do zMesh.Scale = zMesh.Scale + Vector3.new(0.005, 0.005, 0.005) wait(0.05) end end))
wait(0.25) duration = duration - 0.25
debris:AddItem(z, 1) end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false if toolInHand then toolInHand.Parent = vCharacter end for a = 1, #backpackItems do if backpackItems[a] then backpackItems[a].Parent = backpack end end zStorage = {} -- free memory
wait(2.0) sleeping = false end end)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(60) if sleeping then wait(1.0) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false if toolInHand then toolInHand.Parent = vCharacter end for a = 1, #backpackItems do if backpackItems[a] then backpackItems[a].Parent = backpack end end zStorage = {} -- free memory end script:Remove() end))

local vCharacter = script.Parent
local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
while script:FindFirstChild("Direction") == nil do wait() end
local direction = script.Direction.Value
if myTorso then local bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.P = 300000 bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(bv.P, bv.P, bv.P) bv.velocity = direction * 30.0 bv.Parent = myTorso
wait(1.50)
if bv then bv:Remove() end end
wait(2.0) if script then script:Remove() end
